name: Bioinnovation Institute
excerpt: BioInnovation Institute's vision is to support world-class life science innovation that drives the development
description:
BioInnovation Institute's vision is to support world-class life science innovation that drives the development of new solutions by early-stage life science start-ups for the benefit of people and society.

Our mission is to incubate world-class life science and catalyze the commercialization of new solutions through start-ups by using our knowledge, network, funding, and infrastructure.
